Vagla bụ asụsụ Gurunsi (Gur) nke Ghana nke nwere ihe dị ka ndị na-asụ ya puku iri na anọ
A na-asụ ya n'ọtụtụ obodo dị gburugburu mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ nke Mpaghara ndi Ugwu, Ghana
Obodo ndị dị otú ahụ gụnyere: Bole, Sawla, Tuna, Soma, Gentilpe, na Nakwabi

A maara ndị na-asụ asụsụ a dị ka Vaglas, otu n'ime agbụrụ ụmụ amaala gburugburu akụkụ ahụ nke Northern Region, nke ndị Ọchịchị Briten chọtara n'okpuru usoro nchịkwa Gonja "Gonjaland" n'okpuru Sistemu etiti nke Ọchịchị.
